ygData.subject: Re: Who's at the CF for the meeting?
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC Ice already made introductions for the three of them, here s a refreshor. Ice steps forward her robotic smile lighting the room. Thank you,. and you

OOC Ice already made introductions for the three of them, here's a
refreshor.

Ice steps forward her robotic smile lighting the room. "Thank you,. and you
assume correctly, my names Ice, this is Razor Claw, and I believe you've
already spoken to Lunarpine.

Lunarpine stares at the raving bot babbling in front of him. "Slow down,
you'll blow a gasket if your motor keeps running that fast." his concern was
genuine, the bot needed some rest and internal maintenance.

Ice listened while Whistler rambled. "I'm sure Kluster will take good care
of you. Thank you for such a nice introduction.":
----- Original Message -----
From: <Rudra656@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, December 05, 2000 3:41 PM
Subject: Re: Who's at the CF for the meeting?


> ::Whistler::
>     "Hello.  I'm Whistler.  I can't stand fighting, I'm not built for it.
> May I ask who you folks are?  And don't take me too seriously I'm just
> getting sick of waiting.  I'm a bit new here as I was invited in and
everyone
> left.  Do I sound bitter?  I don't even have a place to sit much less
sleep.
> Standing now is the only way I can stay awake.  I'm babbling aren't I?  I
> guess I should stop talking now."
>
>
>
>
